import { Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import './App.css' import { useState } from "react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import {faAngleDoubleDown} from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' function App() { const [isActive , setIsActive] = useState(false) const sidebarHandler = () => { if(isActive === true) { setIsActive(false) } else{ setIsActive(true) } } return (
{isActive && (
Calendar:
Category
Language
)}
); } export default App;
